findings.title: Unnecessary variable assigning
findings.description: The variable `tokenLen` is assigned but only used once and can be replaced with `_atokenAmount.length` directly.

findings.title: A internal function is declared but never used
findings.description: Function getTotalTokensPerArray() is an internal function. It is declared but never used in any contracts.

findings.title: Code can be simplified
findings.description: The if-revert statement can be simplified by using require()

findings.title: @dev should describe function's feature.
findings.description: The developer should provide a description of the function's features to ensure clarity and understanding of its purpose.

findings.title: Prefer explicit declaration of variable types
findings.description: Declaring variables with explicit types instead of relying on Solidity's default type inference can improve code readability and prevent potential issues.
